channel.title: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?" - post your craziest time or luckiest time on BvS here!

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: today I was wasting my money because I am using foa for 30 lives, so I do 1 try on scraties and I got a claymore

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: Good Boy on my first try

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
Luckiest thing that happened to me was when I won 2 Polar Star's one monster. One through Terri and one through the RnG.
On my alt I attacked Storm Riders 1 time and won Regalia.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: Yesterday, I won the big board in the morning, the sevens trophy at evening, and then won the claymore at night. VERY good day

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
winning a lucky sevens trophy + 100k Ryo
then spending the 100k Ryo to on Scratchy tickets winning 2 claymores and selling one for another 100k :D

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: Back in season 1 i attacked the crazed mimiga only 1 time. and it was defeated later and i got the random polar star. and there were like 12 other people who had like 20 more attacks than me on it. =D

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
My alt
winsock

Won RnG drop Soul of Steel

started out by selling 230,000 ryo worth of emo crap went to the slots

Won 40K after 3 spins
Won Lucky Sevens + 1 million Ryo after 50K ryo

went to Claw Machines wasted 200K on the 5001 for nothing

went to the Scratchoff Tickets! spent 800K ryo walked out with

Claymore
Super Potion: 34
Yoma Blood: 46
Golden Potion: 5

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: i got the sevens trophy and a claymore on the same day.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: Well mine was when i won 3 Golden Potions from scratch tickets from first try. (3GP icons and x3 multiplier).

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: Did Wasteland's final mission on my second try, I was all like "C'mon, more successes!" and 'Bang' I get exactly 25.Considering that I had really poor items, that was very lucky.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: I basically done the same thing as you Dresden, except i got the stamina through the hourly bonus stamina. I had 10 waiting for me so i thought meh might aswell use it. Went on D rank and got the mission for the heck butterfly and got it. I dont have edut so i was really lucky, It made me really happy.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: Today I made an alt because I was frustrated after loosing all my money at the wheel ( not that much, Lvl 20 ). After some missions I joined a random village, played the wheel and won Tsunade Mama!

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
Craziest thing was having some 600+ stamina for oe day with no potions- just bonuses and jutsu though thats not hard to get

Luckiest? Has to be getting two sevens jackpots within about an hour

skip08

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: lol lots of lucky and crazy stuff…….lol

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: The only thing so far for me would be using billy for the first time ont the prise wheel and won the Rack

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: I just got billy3 as a result of billy2's 5% successes. it was the second time that he won that mission for me though.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: holy that is really really lucky lol screen shots of ur craziest/luckiest time would also help to inform lol……

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
this happen to me just now
i go on my first withstand the eye patch of the soul
to lvl billy to 3 and billy level automaticly ahd i get 2 buckets(i had olmek in my team)

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: my luckiest thing to happen was when i was able to win billy lvl 3 after a week trying and the next 2 missions both gave me billy buckets xD

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
Today I won the Regalia off of the storm riders attacking our village, and win a stealth suit on the party wheel!

Although I attacked them 38 times, and have spent 460k on the party wheel this season. So you make the call on whether I'm lucky or not.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: I'm at somewhere over 400k spent trying to get the sevens for one character, and well over 100k on the other … neither one has it yet, and one's about to start the loop timer.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
Luckiest - Getting Billy 3 on my second try, then getting 2 buckets and 2 razorblades all in same day so I could Emosuke 3. Getting K-Dogs headband, 2 +50 stamina, and a +100 stamina in the same day.

Unluckiest - 15 tries to get Timmy 2. 200k+ spent on jackpot, no sevens trophy. A week and a half to get Billy 2, can't even remember how many times it took.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: I got lucky sevens after spending less than 30k. It's definitely the luckiest thing that's ever happened to me.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: lol *sigh* we need more people to post!

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: Nice to see somebody can get sevens … I've spent over 300k trying so far.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: nice nice! keep them up i know more than just us have had lucky times in BvS!!!!!!

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: i got the rack, ninja dog and seven trophy on the same day and it was my first time in party house

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: *bump?* are we allowed to bump threads? lol

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: lol heres one for ya……….a while back I was on the wheel and saw the necklace was up there and i was like pfft i wont win but why not? and spun and after 2 spins i won it and i was like OMFG WTF WTF! haha i was almost literally running around trying to think what I should do then lol..so i thought of selling it but kept it instead haha.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
Craziest thing that happened to me:

I play the party house wheel usually 5 times each day, so one day I went in to play and the prize was a Stealth Suit.

So I played, and the very first time I did it. I won a Stealth Suit. Needless to say, I was pretty happy about that.

Then, I played it again. Another Stealth Suit. I actually thought something had glitched because I didn't think that could happen.

So I played it again. A Ninja Puppet, which I already had, but I could at least sell it for a nice sum.

I played it twice more like I normally do, but I didn't really get anything worthwhile after that. Still, two Stealth Suits and a Ninja Puppet is nothing to scoff at, so it was a good day, I guess.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
Luckiest would have to be my Sannin run… The day before the announcment that it was changed to top 3 instead of top 1 I was telling my fellow villagers that it wasn't worth it and that I would loop the following day but then bam the announcment comes up and I decide I can take top 3. I was very under stocked with 9 hair pin peices and only 20k and then the hairpins loops were stopped and I was again in the race… Now the best part the day before I was going for my top 3 run the bug happens and we get free sannin yay for me.

craziest would be 300 stamina worth of referals in one day and none of them have gotten to Chuunin or played the game

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
i guess you guys outdo me by far but the crazyies/luckies thing that ever happened to me in BvS just happened today, and if you believe it or not i was just looking for a thread like this and boom there it is…

yesterday i finally got billy to lvl 3… nothing special really, i did it with few stam left but then today … ohh boy … i startet doing missions with like 300 stam or so … so here is what i collected so far (using only 150 stam of that 300)

4 razorblades
1 billy bucket (YES you know what that means… emo lvl 3)
6 Rock CDs
8 tastyburgers

i was like WTF how can that be? last couple of weeks i didn't get sh** and today wooohooo.. :)

mfg
Thark

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
My village had been trying to get this one upgrade (Potion Palace, I think) for two weeks, but every time we got an advanced resource, we would get raided and it would get swiped before we logged on.

I was doing some something else (probably working on the calculator) when day roll came around. Figuring "why not?", I logged in and played my game. At the end of my stamina, I noticed that we had just enough stuff for the Potion Palace. I bought it, and the five minutes later we got raided.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
I just made an alt today because there were a few things I had wanted to test out with the way the system is right now.

After having earlier today on my main character gotten The Rack without having won any Super Rares, my alt gets K-Dog's Headband on it's third try…. *kicks the Prize Wheel*

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: Well, that happened with my alternative character Madayo at the Prize Wheel. I got two Stealth Suits in a row. Shame though, K-Dogs Headband would've been much better.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded: My first roll on the slots I got enough money to roll again and so on until I won the sevens trophy. It was a 100 thousand win for 3000 ryo. I was really happy and thought it would be easy to win with my other characters I was so wrong.

item.title: Re: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
Yesterday, I seriously lucked out … my VERY FIRST A-rank mission, I picked up Billy's level 3 mission. I had to wait to today to switch teams about, but then I went and did the mission (using a powerful potion and pervert-destroying punch, and even so, I only JUST had the range I needed) figuring I had a 1 in 4 chance of even succeeding in the mission. I managed EXACTLY the number of successes needed, and levelled up Billy to level 3!

Of course, now this means I don't have the great level 2 teams that Billy gives … I suppose there's nothing for it but to level Emosuke too!

item.title: Craziest or Luckiest thing to happen to you on BvS?
item.content:encoded:
Yeah like the title says, my luckiest time/craziest (I say both cuz i was like WTF when it happened) happened on 4/29/08 @ approx: 6:27 PM EST.

I had been trying to get a heck butterfly with no luck! but then after I used all my stamina and went away for a while and came back, I saw that I had gotten a referral so I had 10 (really was like 12) stamina and i was like "Oh what the hey" and went to do the mission and I figured I wouldnt get the mission I needed but bam i got it and i was like "OMG OMG OMG OMG!" and then i thought "Pfft I prob wont get the butterfly….." and used the EDUT and got it! lol that so far is the luckiest/craziest thing to happen to me…..worest part is that im already lvl 45 and still hadnt started the reaper lol but 2 morrow i will for sho!
